pages.text: Aur apney aap ko unhin kay sath rakha ker jo apney perwerdigar ko subha shaam pukartay hain aur ussi kay chehray kay iraday rakhtay hain (raza mandi chahatay hain) khabardaar! Teri nigahen unn say na hatney payen kay dunyawi zindagi kay thaath kay iraday mein lag jaa. Dekh uss ka kehna na manna jiss kay dil ko hum ney apney zikar say ghafil ker diya hai aur jo apni khuwaishon kay peechay para hua hai aur jiss ka kaam hadd say guzar chuka hai

Aur ailaan ker dey kay yeh sirasar bar-haq quran tumharay rab ki taraf say hai. Abb jo chahaye eman laye aur jo chahaye kufur keray. Zalimon kay liye hum ney woh aag tayyar ker rakhi hai jiss ki qanaten unhen gher len gi agar woh faryad rasi chahayen gay to unn ki faryad rasi uss pani say ki jayegi jo tel ki talchat jaisa hoga jo chehray bhoon dey ga bara hi bura pani hai aur bari buri aaram gaah (dozakh) hai
Yaqeenan jo log eman layen aur nek aemaal keren to hum kissi nek amal kerney walay ka sawab zaya nahi kertay

Unn kay liye hameshgi wali jannaten hain inn kay neechay nehren jari hongi wahan yeh soney kay kangan pehnayen jayen gay aur sabz rang kay narm-o-bareek aur motay resham kay libas pehnen gay wahan takhton kay upper takiye lagaye huye hongay. Kiya khoob badla hai aur kiss qadar umdah aaram gaah hai

Aur enhen unn do shakson ki misal bhi suna dey jin mein say aik ko hum ney do baagh angooron kay dey rakhay thay aur jinhen khujooron kay darakhton say hum ney gher rakha tha aur dono kay darmiyan kheti laga rakhi thi
Dono baagh apna phal khoob laye aur iss mein kissi tarah ki kami na ki aur hum ney inn baaghon kay darmiyan nehar jari ker rakhi thi
Al-gharz uss kay pass meway thay aik din uss ney baton hi baton mein apney sathi say kaha kay mein tujh say ziyada maaldaar hun aur juthay kay aitbaar say bhi ziyada mazboot hun
